resources:
Optimal Running Speed Welcome.\nBased on the time you can run a certain distance it is possible to estimate the VO2max and the potential time/speed/pace for any other long distance run. Fill in the required fields to calculate your possible pace and finishing time for a half marathon. Calculate your distance your time
Here are your results:
ml/kg/min (Millilitres of Oxygen per kg body weight per minute) Your max speed for aerobic training runs:
Error Messages Error Please enter a distance. Please check your time entries. Please enter a time. Minutes and seconds can\'t be larger than 59.
